Posts.Content: rndh wrote: in appeal with Horizon BC BS NJ to use Flexitouch pump.  I have truncal lymphedema, chest, back, outer upper arm, very painfull, aching, consuming, in PT presently with massage making me feel better, using sleeve/gauntlet/compression bra, swell spots, unable to do self because of very bad bilat thumb joint arthritis, had cortisone shots, wear thumb splints.  I feel hopeless & afraid that they will not approve this therapy.  Can anyone help? dot Dx 12/25/2006, DCIS, 6cm+, Stage 0, Grade 2, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: lymphedema pump rndh rndh

Posts.Content: Jan 12, 2011 12:01PM rndh wrote: Tactile has me doing the appeal.  I have sent the letter from my doctor & the package prepared by Flexitouch.  Horizon said it is being reviewed by a outside group & that they have 15 days to send me the decision.  I will contact Bob Weiss. I just want to do all I can. Thanks for the advice.
